opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Orders affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Matthew W. Bullock, Jr., Second Deputy City Solicitor, with him Frank J. Pfizenmayer, Assistant City Solicitor, and Edward Q. Bauer, Jr., City Solicitor, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Marano Appeal. Colletti Appeal.
Argued April 27, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Samuel Qorson, for appellants.
Matthew W. Bullock, Jr., Second Deputy City Solicitor, with him Frank J. Pfizenmayer, Assistant City Solicitor, and Edward Q. Bauer, Jr., City Solicitor, for appellee.
September 26, 1967:
